name: Champion Name

skills.name: Skill Name

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.book_value: Value to fully book ex faster cooldown, more damage or debuff chance, etc.
skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

mechanics_tags: Overall champion mechanic tags, listing all mechanics used by this champion (fully booked)

stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: e.g. 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, HP%/DEF% for survivability
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: e.g. 300+ SPD, 100% C.RATE, C.DMG, RES for tank

recommended_gear: Recommended sets and stats for main content(s)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Describe problematic skill priority, targeting, or auto-play behavior

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: If true, describe the cheese mechanic and requirements

mechanics_advisory: Notes on unique mechanics, synergy, or special use cases

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Notes about OCR confidence, validation, or data conflicts

author: Author Name (e.g., GitHub Copilot)
comments: Top-level comments about the entry. For form-specific notes use forms[*].comments.

update_notes.last_patch: Patch version/date and summary of change
